ACT
54
The right of the legatee when the debtor does not inherit
The legatee has the right to demand the completion of the legacy even when the person who was obliged to fill the legacy according to the will died before the testator, or renounced the inheritance, or is unworthy to inherit.
The legatee has the right to demand the completion of the legacy from the persons referred to in Article 51, paragraph 3 of this Act, and in case of default - from the municipality or city who have the position of successor.
